PH::make_coin(C,PH).
coin(C) :- make_coin(C,0.8).
coins_r(SC,SC,0).
coins_r(SC,S,CNT) :-
 CNT > 0,
 
coin(C),
    (C -> NSC is SC + 1 ; NSC = SC),
    NCNT is CNT - 1,
    coins_r(NSC,S,NCNT).
total(S) :- coins_r(0,S,4).
query(total(_)).
